statements: UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_name = 'Contract A', conditions = '{"type":"condition","value":true}' WHERE contract_id = 'd5d70545-bace-46f7-983f-f1ae6d3ec452';
UPDATE smart_contracts SET actions = '{"type":"transfer","amount":100}' WHERE blockchain_address = '0x8d4C7D68F6a77ada8Aa3411Fb2B62AeBc160dCa7';

UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_name = 'Updated Name', contract_code = '{Updated Code}', conditions = '{"condition": "updated"}', actions = '{"action": "updated"}', blockchain_address = 'Updated Address' WHERE contract_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';

UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_name = 'New Contract', actions = '{"action": "new"}', blockchain_address = 'New Address', contract_code = '{New Code}', conditions = '{"condition": "new"}' WHERE contract_id = '4e2f1489-b8c4-4de7-9d48-095d75ca8f79';
UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_name = 'New Contract' WHERE contract_id = 1;
UPDATE transaction_logs SET transaction_status = 'Completed', transaction_timestamp = '2022-05-15 08:30:00' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_code = 'new_code', contract_conditions = 'new_conditions' WHERE contract_name = 'Contract A';
UPDATE transaction_logs SET transaction_status = 'Success', transaction_timestamp = NOW() WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_condition = 'New Condition' WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_wallets SET last_transaction_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, wallet_balance = wallet_balance - 100.50 WHERE user_id = 'a1234567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE smart_contracts SET contract_name = 'Updated Contract 1', contract_code = 'new code' WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE user_wallets SET wallet_balance = 1500.50, last_transaction_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = 'a123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SmartContracts SET contract_code = 'new_code' WHERE contract_id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 100.50, receiver_address = 'new_receiver_address' WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE SmartContracts SET contract_name = 'New Contract Name', contract_conditions = '{"condition1": "updated", "condition2": "modified"}' WHERE contract_id = 1;
UPDATE Transactions SET amount = 5000.00, receiver_address = 'new_receiver_address@example.com' WHERE transaction_id = 3;
UPDATE SmartContracts SET contract_conditions = '{"condition": true}', contract_owner = 'Alice' WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Transactions SET tx_status = 'Processed', tx_amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE SmartContracts SET contract_name = 'Updated Contract Name' WHERE contract_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Transactions SET tx_amount = 1000, tx_status = 'completed' WHERE transaction_id = '987e6543-e89b-41d3-a456-426614174569';
